channel.title: How can make my two codes one

item.title: How can make my two codes one
item.dc:creator: @gs1 gs
item.description:
@gs1 wrote:

if(actionTimer == 0){ if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14089) { actionTimer = 20; stillgfx(409, absY, absX); stillgfx(498, absY, absX); stillgfx(497, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste True lvl 100 Mage VENGEANCE!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } }

if(actionTimer == 0){ if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14077) { actionTimer = 20; stillgfx(482, absY, absX); stillgfx(481, absY, absX); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Teamer with dh? no! 100 Strength VENGEANCE!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } }

there two vengeanceâ€™s but i want them to work on the same emote tab but change depending on the cape i only know how 2 make one work at a time
